name: Dodgy Dancer
description:
Help Corey, the Dodgy Dancer, dodge the falling objects as he dances to the beat.

Move left and right with A and D, respectively.

Move forward and back with W and S, respectively.

Space bar makes Corey JUMP, and shift gives him a bit of speed boost.

See how long you can last as random objects rain down!

EXPOSITION
This is my first game ever, a product of the beginner's "Let's Dev" module in the GameDevUnlocked video game development course. It's been a longtime coming as I joined the course in June 2020, but here it finally is! 

UPDATES
I intend to add in some other features, such as being able to change the music and dance animations as well as some other fun things, but not before putting out another game.

TO THE FUTURE
I intend to release my second game, already in development, Look to the Stars, by the end of October.

I hope you enjoy Dodgy Dancer! It was fun and challenging to make, and I hope it brings a small measure of joy to your life.

To stay up-to-date on updates and future releases, sign up for the email list!
